title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma…) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (Node & browsers).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama (sync & async).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with sync/async and streaming support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive terminal chat wrapper for Ollama with history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & CUDA) for Ollama server.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for QA & RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain in a single Docker Compose.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension to chat with local Ollama models inside the editor sidebar.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for JavaScript/TypeScript clients to talk to Ollama.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package providing Python bindings for Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM completions and summarization via Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.
